select * from ( select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsStock, g.gdsDes, g.gdsDate, a.uuid, a.uploadpath, a.filename , rank () over(partition by g.gdsNum order by rownum) rk from tbl_goods g, goods_category c, tbl_attach a where g.cateCode = c.cateCode AND g.gdsNum = a.gdsNum
) where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}

select * from ( select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsStock, g.gdsDes, g.gdsDate, a.uuid, a.uploadpath, a.filename , rank () over(partition by g.gdsNum order by rownum) rk from tbl_goods g, goods_category c, tbl_attach a where g.cateCode = c.cateCode AND g.cateCode = #{cateCode} or c.cateCodeRef = #{cateCodeRef} AND g.gdsNum = a.gdsNum
) where rk =1 order by gdsNum desc

select * from ( select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsStock, g.gdsDes, g.gdsDate, a.uuid, a.uploadpath, a.filename , rank () over(partition by g.gdsNum order by rownum) rk from tbl_goods g, goods_category c, tbl_attach a where g.cateCode = c.cateCode AND g.cateCode = #{cateCode} AND g.gdsNum = a.gdsNum
) where rk =1 order by gdsNum desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_replydh (gdsNum, memId, repNum, repCon) values (#{gdsNum}, #{memId}, tbl_replydh_seq.nextval, #{repCon})
mapper.select: select r.gdsNum, r.memId, r.repNum, r.repCon, r.repDate, m.memNickname from tbl_replydh r inner join tbl_member m on r.memId = m.memId where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cartNum, memId, gdsNum, cartStock) values (tbl_cart_seq.nextval, #{memId}, #{gdsNum}, #{cartStock})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNum desc) as num, c.cartNum, c.memId, c.gdsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.gdsName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_cart c inner join tbl_goods g on c.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where c.memId = #{memId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(orderId, memId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhon, amount) values(#{orderId}, #{memId}, #{orderRec}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userAddr3}, #{orderPhon}, #{amount})
insert into tbl_order_details(orderDetailsNum, orderId, gdsNum, cartStock) select tbl_order_details_seq.nextval, #{orderId}, gdsNum, cartStock from tbl_cart
mapper.select: select orderId, memId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhon, amount, orderDate, delivery from tbl_order where memId = #{memId}

select o.orderId, o.memId, o.orderRec, o.userAddr1, o.userAddr2, o.userAddr3, o.orderPhon, o.amount, o.orderDate, o.delivery, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gdsNum, d.cartStock, g.gdsName, g.gdsThumbImg, g.gdsPrice from tbl_order o inner join tbl_order_details d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join tbl_goods g on d.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.memId = #{memId} and o.orderId = #{orderId}
